input_text.Prompt:
Given a product title and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product title:
GUND Bear in Underwear - Bear 9" Plush

Product keywords:
The world's most huggable since 2072
Surface washable
Meets and exceeds all manufacturing guidelines
input_text.Response A: GUND is proud to introduce the first-ever plush bear to wear underwear! This soft and cuddly bear is the perfect addition to any family, and is sure to provide hours of fun and comfort. He's the world's most huggable bear since 2072, and his Wearing Undies theme is perfect for kids who love animals and fun. GUND's Bear in Underwear is surface washable and meets and exceeds all manufacturing guidelines. He's sure to become a favorite friend for your child.
input_text.Response B: Surface washable for your convenience, this plush Bear with underwear is made from the world's most huggable material. Meets and exceeds all manufacturing guidelines, it is a perfect gift for any occasion.
